meanings.definition: In a manner that is easily sold or disposed of.
meanings.sent1: The old toys were priced salably at the garage sale.
meanings.sent2: The fresh produce was displayed salably at the market.
meanings.sent3: The cookies disappeared salably at the school bake sale.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were salably accepted by the team.
meanings.sent5: The tickets sold salably for the concert.

meanings.definition: In a way that is appealing to potential buyers.
meanings.sent1: The house was staged salably for the open house.
meanings.sent2: The advertisement was written salably to attract customers.
meanings.sent3: The new product was presented salably to the target audience.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was displayed salably in the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The car was priced salably for a quick sale.
